examples.title: Error-Response:

title: Get all selected parameters for search and create event
name: Search_Parameters

Parameter.description: Id of type destination ("Type" from specification). Required
Contact address for even. Required, min length 3, max length 255
Title of even. Required, min length 3, max length 255
Short description of event. Required, min length 3, max length 255

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
     "city":
         [
             "The city field is required.",
             ......
         ],
     "short_story":
         [
             "The short story field is required.",
             .....
         ],
     .....
 }

title: Create video and image to event
name: Create_media

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
  "videos":
     [
         1 :
             [
                 'title' : 'Same title',
                 'url' : 'Same URL'
             ]
         2 :
             [
                 'title' : 'Same title',
                 'url' : 'Same URL'
             ]
         ........
     ]
   "images":
     [
         1 :
             [
                 'title' : 'Same title',
                 'file' : 'file content'
             ]
         2 :
             [
                 'title' : 'Same title',
                 'file' : 'ile content'
             ]
         ........
     ]
   "_token" : "Gnknh68NbfXCay7GZUIouJQtEO67BPgQ9QckOXCD"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: Create new message to event chat
name: Create_messate

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 OK
 [
     {
         "id":1,
         "event_id":1,
         "user_id":1,
         "admin_send":0,         //This message send user
         "content":"test",
         "is_read":0,
         "created_at":"2018-05-15 13:06:52",
         "updated_at":"2018-05-15 13:06:52"
     },
     {
         "id":2,
         "event_id":1,
         "user_id":1,
         "admin_send":1,         //This message send admin
         "content":"test",
         "is_read":0,
         "created_at":"2018-05-15 13:07:14",
         "updated_at":"2018-05-15 13:07:14"
     }
 ]
